Text: Hey, thanks for the amazing download! Great audio, video, except.. what's up with the random Vietnamese subtitles? o_O They cover up half the page and Santana's sexy face. lmfao. Also, to the people that might download this in the future, when Glee does a cover there are song lyrics. o_O Real pretty, but again. Covers up so much of the screen.. eh. I don't mind that much cause I know a LITTLE bit of Vietnamese. o_O Thanks for uploading!
